item.title: What is Kubernetes?
item.description: What Is Kubernetes? Kubernetes is a system for managing containerized applications across a cluster of servers.

item.title: Top 7 Kubernetes Security Misconceptions and Myths
item.description: Kubernetes can be complex, but once you get to know the basics, it is a wonderful tool allowing you to get up and running quickly.
